description:
spec: receiver types in method expressions can be parenthesized

Fixes issue 4457.

messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org, iant@golang.org, r@golang.org, ken@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=c7fe6d0e90eb ***

spec: receiver types in method expressions can be parenthesized

Fixes issue 4457.

R=rsc, iant, r, ken
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/6862046

LGTM

https://codereview.appspot.com/6862046/diff/5002/doc/go_spec.html
File doc/go_spec.html (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/6862046/diff/5002/doc/go_spec.html#newcode3348
doc/go_spec.html:3348: (T).Mv(t, t)            // receiver types in method expressions may be parenthesized
I think I would omit the comment on this line.

https://codereview.appspot.com/6862046/diff/7004/doc/go_spec.html
File doc/go_spec.html (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/6862046/diff/7004/doc/go_spec.html#newcode3362
doc/go_spec.html:3362: (T).Mv(t, t)
Shouldn't this be "(T).Mv(t, 7)"?

https://codereview.appspot.com/6862046/diff/7004/doc/go_spec.html
File doc/go_spec.html (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/6862046/diff/7004/doc/go_spec.html#newcode3362
doc/go_spec.html:3362: (T).Mv(t, t)
On 2012/12/06 20:05:00, quarnster wrote:
> Shouldn't this be "(T).Mv(t, 7)"?
> 
good catch - will fix in the next spec CL

subject: code review 6862046: spec: receiver types in method expressions can be paren...
